entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is asking for directions to the North Tower.

entities.name: knight
entities.description: A knight who is initially hostile towards Harry, but later becomes his guide. He is described as being exhausted and struggling with his sword.

entities.name: north tower
entities.description: The destination that Harry and the knight are trying to reach. It is mentioned as a place they need to find, but the knight does not know the way there initially.

entities.name: fat pony
entities.description: A pony that the knight tries to mount, but fails. It is described as being fat.

relationships.description: The knight agrees to guide Harry to the North Tower after initially being hostile towards him. This is shown when the knight says 'Come follow me, dear friends...'
Harry and the knight are trying to reach the North Tower. This is shown when Harry asks the knight if he knows the way there.
